import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Book } from 'src/app/interfaces/book'; @Component({ selector: 'app-show-book', templateUrl: './show-book.component.html', styleUrls: ['./show-book.component.css'] }) export class ShowBookComponent { // Creating a public property of type Book and initializing it to an empty object. public book : Book = {} as Book; constructor() { } }
